labels.analysis: The MCP Server "TripAdvisor Vacation Planner" is designed to assist users in planning vacations by leveraging TripAdvisor data. It allows users to search for attractions, restaurants, hotels, and other locations based on various criteria, retrieve detailed information, and get nearby options. The tools provided are focused on location search, retrieval of specific details, and initiating the planning process for trips. This aligns with functionalities typically associated with travel planning, location services, and trip organization.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Travel & Maps" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around location services, travel planning, and navigation, which are central to its purpose. The secondary label "Web Search & Research" is included because the server facilitates searching and retrieving detailed information about locations. The secondary label "Daily Productivity" is added because it assists in organizing and planning vacations, which falls under personal organization and productivity.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: TripAdvisor Vacation Planner
server_info_crawled.author: @Ruqyai/tripadvisor-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide interactive vacation planning by accessing TripAdvisor data to find attractions, restaurants, hotels, photos, and reviews. Search locations by name and category and get detailed information to help plan your perfect vacation. Integrate seamlessly with Claude Desktop for an enhanced planning experience.

tools.name: search_locations
tools.description: Deploy Server TripAdvisor Vacation Planner @Ruqyai/tripadvisor-mcp-server Try in Playground search_locations

tools.name: get_nearby_locations
tools.description: Find locations near a specific latitude and longitude Args: latitude: Latitude coordinate longitude: Longitude coordinate category: Optional category filter (e.g., "hotels", "restaurants", "attractions")

tools.name: get_location_details_tool
tools.description: Get essential details about a location by ID for trip planning Args: location_id: TripAdvisor location ID

tools.name: plan_vacation
tools.description: Initiates the vacation planning process using the structured prompt. This should be used whenever a user wants to plan a trip or vacation. Returns: A message confirming the vacation planning process has started

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@Ruqyai/tripadvisor-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
